content.question: Which of the following best exemplifies mercantilism as it was practiced in the Atlantic trading system by 1750 ?

choices.label: The belief of colonists in the Americas that free trade was desirable
Colonial government policies in Europe that prevented the private accumulation of precious metals
International agreements by European governments to protect the freedom of the seas
The protection of European merchant companies by their respective governments

content.answer: The protection of European merchant companies by their respective governments
